t: Lowe’s Replaces Southwire Electrical Tools with Ideal, Kobalt, and Fluke
s: BIG news here – Lowe’s has all but ditched Southwire Tools in 2021, replacing the brands’ electrical tools with offerings from Ideal, Kobalt, and Fluke.

s: December 10, 2013 - I was in Lowes today and in the ... with a brand named "Blue Hawk". The packaging looked close to the cheap electrical tools they have made by Southwire. When they switched the electrical tools at first they had half of that area with Southwire and half with Ideal/Greenlee/Knipex, and now the others are gone and all they have is Southwire.
